channel.title: Is it possible to BECOME an NPC?
channel.description: When you have the monkey gree gree on runescape in certain places, you become a monkey. The same principle must apply on MoparScape. How do you make it, so that when you hold a certain item, you become a certain NPC? Lol, gnome amulet = become a gnome! Please tell me the codes to make an item turn you into an NPC.

item.title: Is it possible to BECOME an NPC?
item.dc:creator: @camo_chao camo chao
item.description:
@camo_chao wrote:

So does anyone know how?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 20, 2007, 01:10:57 PM[/size][hr]plz help

Read full topic

item.title: Is it possible to BECOME an NPC?
item.dc:creator: @camo_chao camo chao
item.description:
@camo_chao wrote:

I know that, but I want it the be used with an item, that way everyone can use it not just owners. So you’re thinking, just change the code to >=0 or whatever, but then EVERYONE will be albe to change into ANYTHING, not the NPC’s I want. Thanks though guys, I didn’t know about that code, but I still need sometihng else…

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to BECOME an NPC?

item.title: Is it possible to BECOME an NPC?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Lol u dnt have 2 change anything in client all u need to do is

::pnpc (NPC ID)

example. ::pnpc 1552 , Would make me santa

to change back to normal just type ::unpc

hope that helped!

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to BECOME an NPC?

item.title: Is it possible to BECOME an NPC?
item.dc:creator: @Called_enzo Called enzo
item.description:
@Called_enzo wrote:

isnt there a command called ::pnpc???

thats for chanching to npc i tought…

if (command.startsWith("pnpc") && playerRights >= 3) {
				try {
					int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));
					if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) {
						npcId = newNPC;
						isNpc = true;
						updateRequired = true;
						appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
					} else {
						sendMessage("No such P-NPC.");
					}
				} catch(Exception e) {
					sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #");
				}
				 }

Hope it helps : D

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to BECOME an NPC?

item.title: Is it possible to BECOME an NPC?

@system wrote:

Lol if u are Admin/Owner there is a command to turn u into an npc

write - ::pnpc(NPC ID HERE)

Hope that helps
